name: lang/strategy-reference
description: This module provides a mechanism for capturing a reference to a strategy and for applying the referred strategy.

strategies.name: to-sref(s)
strategies.description:
Capture a reference to a strategy as a term. The strategy s must be fully specified (i.e. all its arguments must be specified).

to the strategy is only valid within the instance of the interpreter which produced it
notes: The resulting reference term cannot be pretty-printed or matched against (at least not realiably). The reference

strategies.name: apply-sref( | t)
strategies.description: Apply the strategy referenced by the term. The referenced strategy is applied to the input term.
